price: 4. Realmente, sabemos lo que la tierra consumirá de sus cuerpos y tenemos un registro dondeconstan todas las cosas (la Tabla Protegida).
arabic: قَدۡ عَلِمۡنَا مَا تَنقُصُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ مِنۡهُمۡۖ وَعِندَنَا كِتَٰبٌ حَفِيظُۢ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qad ʿalim'nā mā tanquṣu al-arḍu min'hum waʿindanā kitābun ḥafīẓun
